settings.heading: About AXOLOP
settings.heading_suffix: Building the future of professional audio software
settings.text: AXOLOP is dedicated to creating professional audio software that combines technical precision with aesthetic restraint. We believe in brutal usability - every control exists for a reason, zero clutter.

settings.heading: Our Mission
settings.content: AXOLOP is dedicated to creating professional audio software that combines technical precision with aesthetic restraint. We believe in brutal usability - every control exists for a reason, zero clutter.
